name: docassemble
description: Docassemble is a platform for building guided interviews and document assembly workflows. It helps create legal documents and forms using a python-based logic, web UI, and YAML-driven interview templates. Widely used in legal tech.
features: Guided Interviews: Create interactive questionnaires for document generation. User-friendly forms.
Document Assembly: Automatically generate legal documents from templates. Streamlined paperwork.
Python Logic: Powerful scripting for complex workflows. Flexible automation.
YAML Templates: Simple interview definition format. Easy to learn and maintain.
Legal Tech Focus: Designed specifically for legal document workflows. Industry-standard tool.
Self-Hosted: Keep sensitive legal data on your server. Complete confidentiality and control.
